title: Divergence Eve (Dub)
alternative_title: ダイバージェンス・イヴ
description: In the 24th Century, Intergalactic Space Travel has become a reality. One of the first outposts in the far reaches of space is WATCHER'S NEST - an inflation hole drive portal - which has recently come under attack by a mysterious force known simply as GHOUL... A group of young female cadets assigned to the portal are unexpectedly thrown into a hornet's nest of trouble as they finalize their training to become an elite pilot in the Seraphim Squadron.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Military>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Space>]
